welcomeMsg: Drop files or select here, and/or enter URLs to fact-check
additionalContext: : Claims or additional information about the files and URLs you want to fact-check
claimExample: e.g., I came across this viral video claiming a new "turbo diet"
uploadFailed: Oops, upload failed. Please try again later.
dropEvidenceMsg: Drop files or select here, and/or add URLs as "{}" evidence
additionalEvidenceContext: : Context or additional information about the provided {} evidence
proEvidenceExample: E.g., "In this video a nutrionist explains this turbo diet makes sense"
conEvidenceExample: E.g., "In this video a nutrionist explains why this turbo diet is inconsistent"
shareMessage: Check out how d-FCT is fact-checking "{}":
confirmDeleteTopic: Are you sure you want to delete this topic?
topicCreationFailed: Oops, failed to create topic. Try again later.
fetchURLError: Oops, error fetching URL. Hint: submit screenshots and/or text content for context.
userRegistered: Your account has been registered successfully. Please check your email to confirm and activate it.
userExistsError: It seems your user is already registered. Please try to login or click 'Forgot your password?' to choose a new password.
oauthExistsError: It looks like you signed up using an external account. Please log in with the same method you used to sign up.
loginError: Invalid email and/or password does not match. Please try again or click 'Forgot your password?' to choose another one.
confirmationError: Your account has not been confirmed yet. Please check your email or send a new confirmation link if you did not receive one.
emailConfirmed: Your email has been successfully confirmed. You can now login.
confirmationEmailResent: A new confirmation email has been sent! Please check your email.
errorResendingConfirmation: Oops! We are currently unable to send you a new confirmation link. Please try again later.
sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
joinWaitListSubtitle: Be among the first to get access to d-FCT!
successWaitListMsg: Thank you for signing up! We'll notify you soon.
alreadyOnWaitListMsg: Your email is already on our list. Stay tuned, we'll notify you soon.
errorWaitListMsg: Oops, our waitlist is experiencing temporary issues. Please, try again later.
firstSubmission: Submit your first topic and and join the search for truth.
copiedToClipboard:
Link copied to clipboard!
Now you can share it with others.
shareMessageIntro: Join me on d-FCT, a reward-driven solution for transparent fact-verification
noResultsFound: No topics found for your search.
relatedTopicsIntro: We found the following topics related to the submitted content, you may review them before creating a new one.
settingsFailed: Oops! Error updating settings. Please try again later
confirmYourEmailMsg: We've sent a confirmation link to your email. Please check your inbox and confirm your account to proceed.
avatarUpdateFailed: Oops! Error updating avatar. Please try again later.
usernameUpdateFailed: Oops! Error updating username. Please try again later.
